 This page is for discussing how to add jSCEP to your own project using Maven.  For details     
 on how to _build_ jSCEP using Maven, see the [SourceCode source code] page.

jSCEP is now available from the [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ Maven central repository].  The dependency details are as follows:

|| groupId || *com.google.code.jscep* ||
|| artifactId || *jscep-api*, *jscep-client* or *jscep-server* ||
|| version || *0.20.6* ||

Maven repository hosting for jSCEP artifacts is provided by [http://nexus.sonatype.org/oss-repository-hosting.html Sonatype].

[http://www.sonatype.com http://oss.sonatype.org/images/branding.png]
